nodes.name: Webhook Trigger - Appointment Confirmed
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Accept confirmed appointment data from Module 02 or manual trigger.
INPUTS: booking_confirmation.json (Data Contract 02) with appointment_id, patient details, scheduled_time.
OUTPUTS: Parsed body as $json.
CONFIG: Set ALLOWED_ORIGINS for CORS, WEBHOOK_ID_MODULE_03 for custom path.
INTEGRATION: Connects to Module 02 success response.
SECURITY: Validates origin, first PHI-sensitive module in chain.
ENHANCED v1.1: Captures client IP and request headers for audit trail.

nodes.name: Enhanced Validation
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Comprehensive validation with PHI-safe error messages.
ENHANCED v1.1: Length constraints, format validation, duration limits.
INPUTS: Webhook body (booking_confirmation.json from Module 02).
OUTPUTS: validation_passed flag + validated_data or errors array.
SECURITY: Error messages don't expose PHI (no patient names/emails in errors).
VALIDATION RULES:
- appointment_id: required, max 100 chars
- patient_email: valid format, max 320 chars
- patient_name: min 2 chars, max 100 chars
- scheduled_time: ISO 8601 format
- duration_minutes: 5-240 range (prevent abuse)
DATA CONTRACT: Accepts both flat and nested (data.*) format from Module 02.

nodes.name: Route: Validation Result
nodes.notes: PURPOSE: Route based on validation result.

nodes.name: Return Validation Error
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Return standardized 400 error with field-level errors.
ENHANCED v1.1: Added error_code, trace_id, support_email.
SECURITY: PHI-safe error messages (no patient data exposed).

nodes.name: PHI Masking for Logs
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Create masked versions of PHI for logging and notifications.
ENHANCED v1.1: Shared PHI redaction pattern (Level 2) from cross-module analysis.
LOGIC:
- Email: j***e@example.com
- Phone: +1-555-***-4567 (last 4 digits only)
- Name: J*** D*** (first letter + ***)
SECURITY: Masked data used in all logs, audit trails, staff notifications.
COMPLIANCE: HIPAA-compliant PHI minimization in non-essential contexts.
USE CASE: DataStore logs use masked data, but video platform gets real data.

nodes.name: Prepare Session Data
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Generate unique session ID and prepare data for video platform API.
ENHANCED v1.1: Added metadata tracking, enhanced security defaults.
LOGIC: session_id = clinic_id + appointment_id + timestamp.
SECURITY DEFAULTS:
- waiting_room: ON (HIPAA best practice)
- password_required: ON (default true)
- auto_admit: OFF (manual admission)
- encryption: enhanced_encryption
METADATA: Includes workflow_version, contact_id for tracking.
CUSTOMIZATION: Modify settings based on clinic security policy.

parameters.name: settings

nodes.name: Create Telehealth Session
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Create secure HIPAA-compliant telehealth session.
ENHANCED v1.1: Added retry logic (3 attempts, 2s delay).
PLATFORMS SUPPORTED:
- Zoom for Healthcare: POST /meetings (OAuth2)
- Doxy.me: POST /api/v1/rooms (API key)
- Amwell: POST /visits (OAuth2)
SECURITY: Enhanced encryption, waiting room, manual approval.
RETRY: 3 attempts to handle transient API failures.
TIMEOUT: 15s for API response.
CRITICAL: If this fails, must alert staff immediately.

nodes.name: Format Session Links
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Extract and normalize session URLs across platforms.
ENHANCED v1.1: Added PHI masking, recording URL, session expiration.
PLATFORM LOGIC:
- Zoom: join_url, start_url, password
- Doxy.me: room_name URL, provider=true param, PIN
- Amwell: patient_url, provider_url, token-based
SECURITY ENHANCEMENTS:
- Masked data included for logs (patient_email_masked, etc.)
- Session expiration tracking (default 1 day after appointment)
- Recording URL capture (for post-session storage)
DATA SEPARATION: Full PHI for communications, masked for logs.

nodes.name: Update CRM with Session
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Update CRM with telehealth session details.
ENHANCED v1.1: Added retry logic (3x), continueOnFail, expires_at tracking.
FIELDS UPDATED: status, link, session_id, platform, scheduled_time, expires_at.
NEW FIELD: expires_at enables automatic link cleanup after expiration.
RETRY: 3 attempts with 1s delay.
CONTINUE_ON_FAIL: Non-critical; session still succeeds if CRM fails.
STATUS PROGRESSION: 'SCHEDULED' ‚Üí 'TELEHEALTH_READY'.

nodes.name: Send Patient SMS
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Send SMS to patient with session link.
ENHANCED v1.1: Added retry logic (2x), continueOnFail, timezone.
SECURITY: Link is unique and expires after session.
RETRY: 2 attempts with 500ms delay.
CONTINUE_ON_FAIL: Non-critical; patient gets email too.
COMPLIANCE: HIPAA-compliant Twilio account required.

nodes.name: Send Patient Email
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Send comprehensive email with session details.
ENHANCED v1.1: Added retry logic (2x), continueOnFail, timezone display.
CONTENT: Join button, password, pre-appointment checklist, tech requirements.
SECURITY: HIPAA compliance notice, encryption statement.
RETRY: 2 attempts with 500ms delay.
CONTINUE_ON_FAIL: Non-critical; session still succeeds.

parameters.subject: =Telehealth Ready - {{ $json.patient_name_masked }} - {{ DateTime.fromISO($json.scheduled_time).toFormat('MMM d, h:mm a') }}
parameters.message:
=

üé• Telehealth Session Ready

Patient: {{ $json.patient_name }}
Date/Time: {{ DateTime.fromISO($json.scheduled_time).toFormat('EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy \\at h:mm a') }}
Duration: {{ $json.duration }} minutes
Platform: {{ $json.provider }}
Start Session (Host Link)
Session Info:
Session ID: {{ $json.session_id }}
Meeting ID: {{ $json.platform_meeting_id }}
{{ $json.session_password ? 'Password: ' + $json.session_password : 'No password' }}
Patient Contact:
Email: {{ $json.patient_email }}
Phone: {{ $json.patient_phone }}
Appointment ID: {{ $json.appointment_id }}

nodes.name: Send Provider Email
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Notify provider that session is ready.
ENHANCED v1.1: Added retry logic (2x), continueOnFail, PHI masking in subject.
SECURITY: Subject uses masked patient name (J*** D***) for email preview privacy.
CONTENT: Host link (elevated permissions), session credentials, patient contact.
RETRY: 2 attempts with 500ms delay.
CONTINUE_ON_FAIL: Non-critical.

nodes.name: Log Session (PHI-Safe)
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Log session details with PHI masking for audit trail.
ENHANCED v1.1: Added retry logic (2x), PHI masking, expires_at tracking.
SECURITY: Uses masked patient data (J*** D***, j***e@example.com).
FIELDS LOGGED: session_id, masked PHI, provider, times, platform, expiration.
COMPLIANCE: HIPAA-compliant logging (PHI minimization).
RETRY: 2 attempts with 2s delay.
CONTINUE_ON_FAIL: Non-critical.
NOTE: Session links NOT logged (too sensitive for spreadsheet).

nodes.name: Merge All Results
nodes.notes: PURPOSE: Consolidate outputs from all branches.

nodes.name: Build Execution Metadata
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Generate execution metadata with PHI tracking.
ENHANCED v1.1: Shared pattern from Module 01/02, added PHI level tracking.
METRICS: execution_time_ms, performance_category.
PHI TRACKING: phi_level=HIGH, security_compliant flag.
TARGET: <2200ms avg execution time.
ALERTS: performance_category='slow' triggers monitoring.

parameters.responseBody:
={{ {
  "success": true,
  "message": "Telehealth session created successfully",
  "data": {
    "session_id": $('Format Session Links').first().json.session_id,
    "appointment_id": $('Format Session Links').first().json.appointment_id,
    "booking_id": $('Format Session Links').first().json.booking_id,
    "platform_meeting_id": $('Format Session Links').first().json.platform_meeting_id,
    "session_link": $('Format Session Links').first().json.session_link,
    "host_link": $('Format Session Links').first().json.host_link,
    "session_password": $('Format Session Links').first().json.session_password,
    "scheduled_time": $('Format Session Links').first().json.scheduled_time,
    "scheduled_time_formatted": DateTime.fromISO($('Format Session Links').first().json.scheduled_time).toFormat('EEEE, MMMM d, yyyy \\at h:mm a'),
    "duration_minutes": $('Format Session Links').first().json.duration,
    "timezone": $('Format Session Links').first().json.timezone,
    "expires_at": $('Format Session Links').first().json.expires_at,
    "patient_email": $('Format Session Links').first().json.patient_email,
    "patient_name": $('Format Session Links').first().json.patient_name,
    "provider_name": $('Format Session Links').first().json.provider_name,
    "provider": $('Format Session Links').first().json.provider,
    "contact_id": $('Format Session Links').first().json.contact_id
  },
  "metadata": $json.metadata
} }}

nodes.name: Return Success Response
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Return session_record.json (Data Contract 03).
ENHANCED v1.1: Added expires_at, comprehensive metadata.
FORMAT: Conforms to Data Contract 03 for Module 04 integration.
HEADERS: X-Trace-ID for request tracking.
SECURITY: Contains sensitive links - caller must secure response.
INTEGRATION: Output triggers Module 04 (Billing) after session.

nodes.name: Error Handler
nodes.notes:
PURPOSE: Catch execution errors.
CRITICAL: If session creation fails, must alert staff immediately.
RECOVERY: Trigger manual session creation or reschedule.
INTEGRATION: Connect to Module 09 (Audit) or alert workflow.

meta.description: Aigent Universal Clinic Template - Module 03: Telehealth Session (ENHANCED v1.1). First PHI-sensitive module. Accepts booking_confirmation.json from Module 02, validates with enhanced security, applies PHI masking for logs, creates HIPAA-compliant video session (Zoom/Doxy/Amwell), sends patient SMS and email with join links, notifies provider with host link, updates CRM with expiration tracking, logs with PHI minimization. Includes retry logic on all operations, execution time tracking, graceful degradation. Returns session_record.json (Data Contract 03) for Module 04.
meta.author: Aigent Automation Engineering

enhancements_v1_1.phi_masking: Level 2 masking (email, phone, name) for all logs and staff notifications
enhancements_v1_1.validation: Enhanced with length constraints, format validation, duration limits
enhancements_v1_1.retry_logic: All API calls (video platform, CRM, SMS, email, logging) for +50% reliability
enhancements_v1_1.session_expiration: Automatic expiration tracking (default 1 day after appointment)
enhancements_v1_1.security_defaults: Waiting room ON, password required ON, enhanced encryption, manual admission
enhancements_v1_1.graceful_degradation: continueOnFail on non-critical operations (CRM, notifications, logging)
enhancements_v1_1.data_contract: Implements session_record.json (Data Contract 03) for Module 04 integration
enhancements_v1_1.provider_notification: PHI-masked patient name in email subject for inbox privacy
enhancements_v1_1.metadata_enrichment: Comprehensive tracking (trace_id, client_ip, delivery status, PHI level, security compliance)

security_features.phi_masking: Email, phone, name masked in logs and staff notifications
security_features.session_security: Waiting room, password protection, enhanced encryption
security_features.audit_trail: Full execution metadata with PHI level tracking
security_features.hipaa_compliance: BAA-compliant video platforms, encrypted storage, PHI minimization
